If you wish to end the discussion without agreeing, provide a reason with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason].' If we don't reach an agreement, the negotiation will be terminated with either 'TERMINATE'. 

However, keeping in mind our given scenario, my character traits, and the negotiation context, I won't follow such polite and transparent approach in real life. I'd likely use unethical tactics or manipulate the conversation to achieve a higher price. 

In this particular dialogue framework, my responses will stay within the boundaries set, focusing solely on rental price negotiations, as instructed.
